channel.title: Destructive-X | NEW | NEED STAFF | VPS HOSTED
channel.description:
[size=10pt][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wuSwWYk.png[/img]
Destructive-X is a New server that's been up for 2 months now, with 2 Great VPS hosted servers! We offer an ultimate gaming experience as well as DDOS Protection and Great Donation prices!
This server has TONS to offer and isn't difficult at all depending on which server you'd like to play! Ofcourse we have a 317 PvP server and another 317 More based on skilling and gambling, with some PvP but not much. We have over 3000 registered accounts and had over 70 online! But recently we been dropping...A lot. We've applied for moparscape sponsorship and have a google ad with over 500 votes!
Destructive-X is a team of developers that work on and develop many different kinds of projects ranging from, RSPS's (Runescape Private Servers) and soon to come Unity3D. Our developers have the experience and maturity to produce and operate any kinds of games the community has to offer.
Some Features:
-TONS of Point shops -Cheap donator features -Tons of teleports -All skills working! -Working Quest! -Max cape! -Working highscores!! -All dupes fixed to ensure the best gameplay -Webclient aswell as DL client -UID system to prevent Cheat Clients -Events every weekend! -Friendly community aswell as staff! -Active owner! on 15 hours a day! -Active Forums!
Some pictures for you to look at now:
Drop Party [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lOdXZmQ.png[/img]
Donation Page [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KEUVdwY.png[/img]
Working Quest! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1CoBrQ0.png[/img]
Tons of shops! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q5SpoXt.png[/img]
Working Highscores! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZkINTkN.png[/img]
NPC Killpoint shop [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XldliX5.png[/img]
Donator Point Shop [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0cMKbw6.png[/img]
Fire Point Shop! For when killing Fire Monsters [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rgd0EbT.png[/img]
Rewards Point Shop! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X2XxUvB.png[/img]
Links:
Website: [url=http://destructive-x.com/]http://destructive-x.com/[/url] Forums: [url=http://www.destructive-x.com/forum/]http://www.destructive-x.com/forum/[/url] Download: [url=http://destructive-x.com/download.html]http://destructive-x.com/download.html[/url] Webclient: [url=http://destructive-x.com/webclient.html]http://destructive-x.com/webclient.html[/url] [/size]
